mapper.select: SELECT distinct i.item_no AS itemNo, i.item_title AS title, i.item_content AS content, i.item_amount AS amount, io.stock AS stock FROM item i INNER JOIN item_option io ON i.item_no = io.item_no WHERE i.item_no = #{itemNo}
SELECT file_name AS fileName, file_path AS filePath, save_name AS saveName, file_order AS fileOrder FROM item_file WHERE item_no = #{itemNo} ORDER BY file_order
